post:
AreLink.com provides reliable and scalabe budget VPS hosting solutions with OpenVZ virtualization and full control with SolusVM. We have been in the hosting business since 2010 under our parent company's brand [HostingDale]. Our current VPS server plans are located in PhoenixNap Datacenter. All VPS packages come with full root access, remote reboots and OS re-installs.

 

We also offer a full 15-day Money back guarantee on all plans, so you can test drive our servers and if you are not satisfied, we will give you your money back. Very Simple!

 

Use coupon code: VPSB20 for a 20% discount on all VPS plans! We also offer INSTANT setup!*

 

Location: PhoenixNap Datacenter, Phoenix, AZ.

 

Operating Systems: Various versions of CentOS, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSuse, Debian

 

Test File (100MB): http://192.30.139.19/100mbtest.bin

 

Plan Details:
